description:
This additional content includes:

- "Brilliance Eclipsed - Gore Magala: Jazz Version" BGM
- "A Thousand Shining Blades - Seregios: Jazz Version" BGM
- "A Shocking Scoundrel - Astalos: Jazz Version" BGM
- "Basking in Eternal Breeze: Jazz Version" BGM

Enjoy these jazz arrangements in different locations around Elgado Outpost!

- Music can be set in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.
- Music cannot be changed during quests.
name: "Monster & Elgado Music: Jazz Version" BGM
